name: VirtualPepTalk
0:
”Alexa, open virtual pep talk”
”Alexa, start virtual pep talk”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual pep talk
des:
Looking for encouragement? Get a daily dose of positivity with a Virtual Pep Talk from your Virtual BFF, Mandy Ansari. Start your day with an inspirational list of curated quotes that have been hand selected by Mandy to help you fuel your mind with the positivity you need to have a productive and positive day. 

When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
